name: Nilight 2PCS 18W 1260lm Spot Driving Fog Light Off Road Led Lights Bar Mounting Bracket for SUV Boat 4 Jeep Lamp
productDescription: High intensity Cree LED chips, 60 6000K daylight 1800lm ultra bright flood light, sufficient brightness on road.
Die-casting black aluminum housing sealed with toughened glass lens, passive heat dissipation, shatterproof and quakeproof.
IP68 highest rated waterproof and dustproof quality head light available in the market, can be use in wet locations and extreme dusty areas.

reviewers.name: Bob
reviewers.review: So far so good with these light bulbs! Not only are they high quality bulbs made with quality materials, but they are also really durable! Yes, they are bulbs, but they are built well enough that they aren't super fragile either! They are easy to install too. They twist in effortlessly which I like. And, they look modern and nice too!

reviewers.name: Kay
reviewers.review: Great product, very durable so it wont break if you drop the bulb. No flicker
